original_text: They crossed the Jordan River. They made their first camp in a valley, on the south side of Aroer. Then they went through Gad's land and they reached Jazer.
korean_text: 요단을 건너 갓 골짜기 가운데 성읍 아로엘 오른쪽 곧 야셀 맞은쪽에 이르러 장막을 치고

sentences.original_text: They made their first camp in a valley,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 계곡에 첫 번째 진지를 만들었고,

sentences.original_text: on the south side of Aroer.
Then they went through Gad's land
